```{r}
library(gapminder)
library(ggplot2)
```

## A summary of the dataset
```{r}
summary(gapminder)
nrow(gapminder)
```

```{r}
range(gapminder$lifeExp)
mean(gapminder$lifeExp)
```



## A boxplot of life expectancy by year
```{r}
ggplot(gapminder, aes(year, lifeExp, group = year))+
  geom_boxplot()+
  labs(x ="Year", y ="Life expectancy")+
  theme_classic()
```
